CutSceneText.Text: The Aetheric Field that surrounds the fortress is vital to its defence
because it can render the attackers irrelevant.
The Field will decimate enemies who try to force their way through it,
so unless the attackers have overwhelming numbers
they won't attack the fortress from the sky.
But it is possible to shut down the Aetheric Field
by destroying the generator inside the fortress.
Take out the Aetheric Field Generator,
and the attackers can assault the fortress.
